participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and friendly; enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks. I have the best dogs in the world and I would brag about them to my friends if I was famous. I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes. My brother works at Best Buy. I live in Colorado.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable; loves discussing hobbies and family life.
participant_2.background: I want to talk about my style. I am from Austin, Texas. I saw a solar eclipse when I was 8 years old. I like to collect Halloween toys and wear comfortable clothes. I am married with three kids.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from a trip to Austin, TX.
Oh nice! I'm actually from there! What did you do there?
I went to the rodeo, saw the bats fly out at night, and had a lot of great food.
That sounds awesome! I miss the food there. I live in Colorado now.
Oh, that's so cool! I've always wanted to go to Colorado.
It's beautiful here. I love the mountains.
I bet! I love hiking and camping.
Me too! We should go hiking sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Awesome! I'll DM you my number
